description:
Tree Works Application in Highbury Fields Conservation Area, 33 and 35 Corsica Street, Islington London N5 1JT

A tree application has been received to do the following works in the rear of the above addresses:

Rear garden:

T1 - Ash
-	Crown Reduce by 30%
-	Crown Thin by 30%
-	Remove deadwood in the crown
-	Remove reminding stumps where branches has failed in the past

T2 - Horse Chestnut
-	Crown Thin by 20-25%
-	Removal of deadwood in the crown 
-	Cut back overhang towards the property leaving a gap of 3 metres

T3 - Ailanthus
-	Crown thin by 20-25% but no more than 30% 
-	Remove deadwood in the crown

T4 - Fig
-	Cut back overhang to property
-	Crown reduce by 30%


Front (Corsica Street)

T5 - Indian bean Tree
-	Reduce back to previous reduction points.
decision_conditions: There is also decay pockets in the 'Original Pollard Points' I will recommend to have it inspected
